title: Mark Leibovich: "You can't fire" NFL owners
description: Chief national correspondent for The New York Times Magazine, Mark Leibovich sits down with Chuck to discuss his new book, 'Big Game: The NFL in Dangerous Times,' examining the era of Trump through the lens of the NFL.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
